title: West Cheshire Association Football League
text:
The West Cheshire Association Football League (commonly known as the West Cheshire League) is an <a href="Football%20in%20England">English</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league in the county of <a href="Cheshire">Cheshire</a>, which also includes teams from <a href="Merseyside">Merseyside</a>. Its current principal sponsor is "Carlsberg", also sponsor of the <a href="South%20West%20Peninsula%20League">South West Peninsula League</a>. It has a Division One, Divisions Two and Division Three. Division One sits at step 7 (or level 11) of the <a href="National%20League%20System">National League System</a>.
If they have floodlights, the league's clubs are eligible for the <a href="FA%20Vase">FA Vase</a> but not the <a href="FA%20Cup">FA Cup</a>, and its champions are eligible for promotion to the <a href="North%20West%20Counties%20Football%20League">North West Counties Football League</a> Division One. After several triumphs in Division One, <a href="Cammell%20Laird%20F.C.">Cammell Laird</a> was promoted to the North West Counties League in 2004, and its reserve team, which had won Division Two, was promoted to the Division One. It was the only team since <a href="Vauxhall%20Motors%20F.C.">Vauxhall Motors</a> to be promoted from the league, until <a href="Runcorn%20Town%20F.C.">Runcorn Town</a> was promoted in 2010. In 2014, Vauxhall Motors returned to the league.
The league also runs cup competitions.
2021–22 member clubs.
Division Two.
Ashville reserves | Cheshire Lines | Helsby | <a href="Litherland%20REMYCA%20F.C.">Litherland REMYCA</a> Reserves | <a href="Maghull%20F.C.">Maghull</a> reserves | Mallaby | Marine U23 | Marshalls Reserves | Mossley Hill Athletic reserves | Poulton Vics | Rainford United | Rainhill Town reserves | Runcorn Sports | <a href="South%20Liverpool%20F.C.">South Liverpool</a> reserves | South Sefton Borough | West Kirby 
Division Three.
Aintree Villa Reserves | Bootle Reserves | Capenhurst Villa Reserves | Chester Nomads Reserves | Ellesmere Port Town Reserves | Groves Athletics | Heswall Reserves | Mersey Harps | Neston Nomads | Poulton Royal | Poulton Vics Reserves | Runcorn Sports Reserves | South Liverpool 3rd | Sutton Athletics | West Kirby Reserves | Willaston
